Articles.Content:
Hope this is in the right place, just now I saw rowsdower say `17 pages in one day` but when I look at the page number it shows 5.

This happens a lot, is there a way to set how many posts make up a `page` so when people say `the post is on page 34` and I only have 20 pages I`ll be able to find the post they are talking about?

EDIT : also, I looked for the `forum forum` but could not find it. Is it gone or did I miss it?

You probably edited the setting in your profile that determines how many replies are shown on one page in a topic. Default is 10, maximum is 40 You can always ask people for a direct link to a post, that still works (you can get one by clicking the number on the top right of a post)
